Text.Language: Nem n/etswt e~bol nemaf m~p~caji n~te ]meym/i qen oucwouten.
And those who rightly handle the word of truth with him,

grant them unto Your holy Church to shepherd Your flock in peace.

Ariv~meui~ P[oic n~nih/goumenoc: nem nip~recbuteroc n~oryodoxoc: nem nidiakwn.
Remember, O Lord, the orthodox hegumens, priests, and deaconsâ€”

Nem e~h~r/i e~jen n/etsop m~paima: nem n/e~tauenkot.
And for those who are in this place, and those who have fallen asleep,
the bishops, hegumens, priests, deacons, and subdeacons.
Proceuxacye u~per twn /~gomenwn ke p~recbuterwn ke diakonwn ke u~podiakonwn epta tagmatwn tou Yeou t/c ekk~l/ciac.
Pray for the hegumens, priests, deacons, subdeacons, and the seven orders of the Church of God.
